CVE-2021-44228.description: Apache Log4j2 JNDI features do not protect against attacker controlled LDAP and other JNDI related endpoints
CVE-2021-44228.mitigation: Update to Log4j 2.17.0 or later, or remove JndiLookup class from classpath
CVE-2021-44228.workaround: Set system property 'log4j2.formatMsgNoLookups' to 'true' or remove JndiLookup class
CVE-2021-44228.advisory: Log4Shell vulnerability affecting millions of systems
CVE-2021-44228.credits: Discovered by Chen Zhaojun of Alibaba Cloud Security Team

CVE-2021-45046.description: Apache Log4j2 Thread Context Lookup Pattern vulnerable to remote code execution in certain non-default configurations
CVE-2021-45046.workaround: Disable thread context patterns or upgrade
CVE-2021-45046.impact: Remote code execution in non-default configurations

CVE-2017-0144.description: Windows SMBv1 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (EternalBlue)
CVE-2017-0144.mitigation: Apply Microsoft security update MS17-010, disable SMBv1
CVE-2017-0144.workaround: Block TCP ports 139 and 445 at network perimeter
CVE-2017-0144.impact: Remote code execution leading to wormable spread
CVE-2017-0144.credits: NSA exploit leaked by Shadow Brokers

CVE-2014-0160.description: Heartbleed bug in OpenSSL - buffer over-read in TLS heartbeat extension
CVE-2014-0160.mitigation: Update OpenSSL to 1.0.1g or later, reissue SSL certificates
CVE-2014-0160.impact: Information disclosure of up to 64KB of memory per request
CVE-2014-0160.advisory: Critical vulnerability affecting ~17% of internet's secure web servers
CVE-2014-0160.credits: Discovered by Neel Mehta of Google Security
